@@ -27,0 +27,1 @@ + * 8256208 @@ -51,0 +52,6 @@ + checkOutput("index.html", true, + """ + + """); @@ -159,0 +166,21 @@ + + @Test + public void testMixed() { + javadoc("-d", "out-mixed", + "-sourcepath", testSrc("src1"), + testSrc("src1/C.java"), + "pkg"); + checkExit(Exit.OK); + + checkOutput("index.html", true, + """ +

+
+

"""); + }
